english.segment1: Test this gold for its worth is the same as testing me. And the fire burns easily today
english.segment2: The net is the good that's left after the metal is refined. As I melt, look at what I've got and. Separate it all from what I need
english.segment3: I'll take anything, anything genuine. Looking up from where I went I could take whatever I get. I'll take anything, anything genuine
english.segment4: More interesting is my faith than the fear of what I'll miss. And those things are temporary anyway
english.segment5: Still on this side getting fit for a faith that's been tried. And I smile more believably while getting just enough to know I need
english.segment6: I'll take anything, anything genuine. Looking up from where I went, I could take whatever I get. Falling from Your hands or falling from Your lips. As long as it's from You, I know that I can take it, I can take it
